SourceString: Leathers and furs grant centaurs basic protection while not hindering their superior mobility.
Centaur Spiritcallers are respected in their tribe as both capable warriors and powerful shamans.
Iron armor as worn by the strongest centaur warriors, able to deflect frontal impacts at high speed.
Centaurs use their massive streangth to wield great weapons.
A centaur greatbow, used for hunting on the plains.
A heavy and powerful weapon wielded by centaur champions.
A centaur\'s belt knife, heavy enough to fight with.
A heavy spear usually used by centaur hunters.
A fine spear used by distnguished centaur hunters.
A brutal blade often wielded by centaur raiders.
It takes great strength to toss a centaur weapon.
Centaur shamans use this to sap strength from their foes.
A reinforced centaur shield, designed to deflect a rival\'s arrows.
A fiery staff used by Brandbearer spellcasters.
The voices of centaur ancestors speak through this wand.
Lightly built, yet sturdy enough to withstand a running impact.
A popular weapon and tool within the centaur ranks.
A crude yet powerful weapon often wielded by centaurs.
A large curved blade, perfect for cutting down foes on the run.
